short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever you browse to a German MSDN page, this extension redirects you to the en-US version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing to German MSDN pages, starting with https://msdn.microsoft.com/de-de/, MSDN Redirect will redirect you to the U.S. English version instead.
